item.title: But can your text editor do this ? | Avearge Vim User Experience
item.description: Yes, you read it right!, I use vim as my daily driver coding kit!, some people say you can’t and others just doubt that saying; you can’t do proper coding on real production projects unless you have a bloated IDE like VS Studio or intellij, in this blog I will prove the opposite!

item.title: Getting into hacking [Hacking Challenges]: Can you hack it?
item.description: This is my attempt to solve the “Can you hack it?” Challenge. I will share the solutions and how to achieve thme, without spoiling the secrets.

item.title: Use you home modem when electricity is down !
item.description: In the palce I live in, electricity goes off everyday for 2 hours and I really need the internet connectoin that time, because you know it’s 2023, Internet is a like water, no one can live without it.

item.title: How to update discord on archlinux ?
item.description: I hate discord updates!, they do lots of updates which prevents discord desktop from launching. Bad for me that I use Archlinux, as discord ships thier updates as .deb.
